answers.question: What services are available at this center?
answers.answer: The center offers free medical consultations and access to medical services, psychological support for refugees of any age, and help with translation in English, Russian, or Ukrainian languages.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How can someone get help at this center?
answers.answer: Someone can get help at this center by making an appointment. Appointments can be made by calling 0747 278 486 or 0748 185 714.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.question: When is the center open?
answers.answer: The center is open Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 18:00.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.question: What kind of medical help is offered?
answers.answer: Medical help includes consultations with specialists like a pediatrician, cardiologist, diabetologist, ophthalmologist, and dentist. It is also possible to do an ultrasound, ECG, measure blood pressure, and check blood glucose levels.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How can someone make an appointment?
answers.answer: Appointments can be made by calling 0747 278 486 or 0748 185 714. Calls can be made in Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian, or English.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.
